It's Portal. A definite classic of videogames. Totally worth full price, but buying the Portal bundle or the Orange Box collection just make it better. The gameplay is fun, the story is interesting, and it's just overall amazing. My only regrets are that I didn't play this sooner.
Jogo muito gostosinho de jogar, curto mas muito bem feito. Recomendo muito, principalmente pra quem gosta de puzzle.

Portal é um jogo bem diferente do que vemos por aí, possui uma história interessante e uma jogabilidade única. 

O gameplay é bastante simples, bem semelhante a outros FPS, com a seguinte diferença: botão esquerdo do mouse abre um portal azul, enquanto o botão direito abre um portal laranja. Portais podem ser colocados em quase todas as superfícies. A física do game é de impressionar, quando o jogador atravessa um portal, a inercia do jogador é mantida, permitindo que ele possa abrir um portal no fundo de um buraco e aproveitar a velocidade ganha na queda para ser arremessado.  A narrativa do jogo é contada pela GLADOS que, conforme vai passando as fases, ela vai revelando as suas verdadeiras intenções.

Enfim, Portal é um game com um conceito diferente, uma jogabilidade única e satisfatória, uma boa narrativa, boa trilha sonora (Still Alive) e um baixo custo. Bom jogo!
you shouldn't be allowed to download steam without buying this game.
it is a classic a true gamer should have played it at the very least.
je to rychlovka na 2 až 3 hoďky

if u like puzzles then this game is for u!!!!

This along with Portal 2 are among some of the best games that I have ever played. 

The amount of lore and humour in this game is just amazing. It is also a very immersive experience with a very simple HUD and no cutscenes.

The only main downsides are that the game is very linear and that it only lasts about 2 hours. That's why I recommend getting the bundle of both Portal games.

If you like video games (if you don't wtf are you doing here?) no matter what genre, play both Portal games. They are absolute masterpieces.

Such an amazing game. The achievements are fun to complete, and it uses strats in the harder one that would never come into a causual's mind. The chambers are fair, and are always rewarding. Portal is iconic for the Portal gun, but the music is great and Escape is genius for teaching you all you need for the final boss.
it was so good i cummed all over my moniter and keyboard

Best short game I've ever played! I haven't seen anything like Portal. Portal 2 is more chaotic and there's more action, but Portal is more silent and relaxing. The music can make you feel a little uneasy at times, but I think that's the OST's main goal. If you remove the comedy, Portal is a horror game. That's what makes this game special, in my opinion. 10/10
